name: The Storm Cloud
description: This drink tastes like a boozy grapefruit soda, with a nice combination of bitter and sweet flavors.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce fresh juice from 1 pink grapefruit
Grapefruit twist and kosher salt for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Add Cocchi Americano, Fernet Branca, grapefruit juice, and simple syrup to cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until chilled, about 10 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass.
Top with soda and stir gently to incorporate. Garnish with a long grapefruit swath and a pinch of kosher salt on the top of the ice cube.
